channel.title: don't skip dessert on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in don't skip dessert on courtside nyc

item.title: pies n thighs
item.description: thoughts want to try to everything on the menu menu highlights chicken biscuit pie obviously

item.title: 4 charles prime rib
item.description: thoughts even offering a kidney isn’t enough to get a resy, godspeed menu highlights burger is truly very good

item.title: francie
item.description: thoughts worth it menu highlights duck pasta

item.title: cafe camellia
item.description: thoughts heavy on the fried food, but no regrets menu highlights fried green tomatoes crab claws red beans & rice

item.title: paros
item.description: thoughts lot of suits menu highlights dessert

item.title: cecchi's
item.description: thoughts when dinner is the night out want to take anyone and everyone i know here menu highlights pork chop cheesecake

item.title: golden swan
item.description: thoughts old converted town house, multiple levels, full shower in one of the bathrooms, very cool bar on first floor is also great for a date rented out the entire top floor for work dinner, fanastic menu highlights sticky toffee pudding

item.title: dame
item.description: thoughts top contender for best meal of 2023 menu highlights everything is good, can’t miss the fish n chips though such a good wine list

item.title: superiority burger
item.description: thoughts walk-in only. get here just before it opens for an early dinner. bar in the back - serves pints of ice cream and burgers late nite do not skip dessert menu highlights can’t go wrong

item.title: rosella
item.description: thoughts tough reservation, but saw several people walk in right when it opened, so great for walk-in early dinner menu highlights dragonfly house salad we also got something with apples that was insance, but i think that dish might be seasonal

item.title: emmett's on grove
item.description: thoughts super thin crust pizza is delicious and 6 “slices” feels like 1 normal slice of pizza, so your group can order multiple pizzas and not live in fear of leftovers or over-ordering i saw two birthday dinners during my 2 hour dining experience and they bring out sparklers! they have a couple big tables, but the best is the giant circular booth in the back left corner. you can fit 10 friends and get to talk to everyone! menu highlights key lime pie was so good it brought tears to my eyes.

item.title: yellow rose
item.description: thoughts the tacos are delicious, but the apps are the real star of the show menu highlights lonestar beer queso is a must sheet cake

item.title: mel's
item.description: thoughts great spot to come with a big group or a birthday dinner. menu highlights “the oil” side sauce the ice cream sundaes are gas

item.title: contramar
item.description: thoughts invented the tuna tostada. menu highlights tuna tostada soft shell crab butterfly fish do not skip dessert !!!

item.title: thai diner
item.description: thoughts i have waited anywhere from 20 mins to 1.5 hours for a table here, but it’s deinitely worth it. better to get there early, put your name in, and grab a drink at one of the million bars in the area. i recommend mother’s ruin they have limited resys, but i think they’re more flexible for a large party of more than 7. menu highlights disco fries pea shoots mango sticky rice

item.title: rule of thirds
item.description: thoughts had my company holiday party here and it was a huge hit, also surprisingly affordable for 35 people. menu highlights duck fried chicken rice cooker pudding - not for everyone but i loved it.

item.title: jacob's pickles
item.description: thoughts looks expensive, but one sandwich lasted me 3 meals
